column4: this is the error xine give me, "libdvdread: Encrypted DVD support Unavailable."
oh i dont see libdvdcss2 in my repository
Go ahead and apt-get install libdvdcss2 then.
Should work for ya after that.
Package libdvdcss2 is not available, but is referred to by another package.
This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or
is only available from another source
E: Package libdvdcss2 has no installation candidate
how do i set up the extra reps
isnt there a way to do it from synaptic without terminal
wouldn't know to be honest. I love CLI.
